lead_paragraph: New York City and an environmental group found high levels of pollutants in neighborhoods where buildings burn No. 4 or No. 6 oil.
snippet: New York City and an environmental group found high levels of pollutants in neighborhoods where buildings burn No. 4 or No. 6 oil.

headline.main: Studies Find Heavy Heating Oil Has Severe Effect on Air Quality
headline.seo: Studies Link No. 4 and No. 6 Heating Oil to Poor Air Quality
headline.print_headline: Studies Find Heavy Heating Oil Has Severe Effect on Air Quality
